name: Aldrees Petroleum and Transport Services Company
description: Aldrees Petroleum and Transport Services Company engages in the wholesale and retail of fuel, gasoline, and oil in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates through Petroleum Services and Transport Services segments. The company offers various services related to additives, car wash, tire servicing, alignment, accessories, food, mosque, ATMs, car rental, and others; electronic fueling system; and operates fuel stations. It also provides transportation and logistics services for liquid and dry materials through trucks and trailers. The company was formerly known as Mohammed Saad Aldrees And Sons Company Ltd. and changed its name to Aldrees Petroleum and Transport Services Company in December 2004. Aldrees Petroleum and Transport Services Company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
